FLT INTENDING TO USE THIS AWY SHALL FILE FPL
VIA ROVAD DCT IKA DVOR/DME,
RADAL AVBL FOR OIII/OIIE/OIIP ARR.

FOREIGN AIRLINES AND ACFT OPS DEPARTING
FM IRANIAN AIRPORTS ARE REQUIRED
TO ADDRESS FPL AND RELATIVE UPDATES TO ADDRESS OIIXIFPS,
FOR TRANSITING INTL FLT VIA TEHRAN FIR AND

SHALL FLW PROCEDURE SPECIFIED IN IRAN AIP ENR 1.11 .

content.text:
TRIGGER NOTAM-PERM AIRAC AIP AMDT 1/26 WEF 19 FEB 2026
WILL BE IN FORCE AND FLW INFO MENTIONED:
THE AIP SUP 13/25 PUBLISHED AND SUPERSEDES AIP SUP 10/25 AND 
AIP SUP 94-105/15, 11/25 WILL BE CANCELED,
SOME CHANGES IN PART GEN: 0.2, 0.3, 0.4, 2.3, 
SOME CHANGES IN PART ENR: 2.1, 3.1, 3.3, 4.1, 5.1.3, 6.1,
SOME CHANGES IN PART AD: 
OIBA: ALL IAC,
OIMB: ATS COM FAC, CHART RELATED TO AD, ADC, ALL SID,STAR AND IAC,
OICC: AD GEO AND ADMINISTRATIVE DATA, HANDLING SERVICES AND FAC,
 APRONS, TWYS, SFC MOV GUIDENCE AND CTL SYSTEM AND MARKINGS,
 OBST, MET INFO, RWY PHYSICAL CHARACTERISTICS, DECLARED DISTANCES,
 APCH AND RWY LGT, RADIO NAV AND LDG AIDS, LOC TFC REGULATIONS
 CHART RELATED TO AD, ADC, ALL SID, STAR AND IAC,
OIBK: APCH AND RWY LGT, RADIO NAV AND LDG AIDS, IAC 1-1, IAC 1-2
OIMM: FLT PROC,
OIGG: RADIO NAV AND LDG AIDS, CHART RELATED TO AD, SID 2-1, 
 SID 2-2, STAR 2-1, IAC 1-1, IAC 1-2, IAC 4-1, IAC 4-2, IAC 4-3,
  IAC 4-4,
A0249/26 NOTAMN
Q) OIIX/QOATT/IV/BO/A/000/999/
A) OIIX PART 2 OF 2 B) 2602190000 C) 2603042359
E)
OICS: IAC 1-1, IAC 2-1,
OIKY: AD GEO AND ADMINISTRATIVE DATA, APRONS,TWYS, OBST, MET INFO,
  RADIO NAV AND LDG AIDS, ALL IAC,
OIMT: APRONS, TWYS, MET INFO, OTHER LGT AND SRY PWR SUPPLY, ADC
OITT: AD GEO AND ADMINISTRATIVE DATA, OBST, ALL IAC,
OIIE: STAR 1-1, STAR 1-3,
OIII: RESCUE AND FIRE FIGHTING SER, SEASONAL AVILIBILITY, 
 APRONS, TWYS, SFC MOV GUIDENCE AND CTL SYSTEM AND MARKINGS,
 RWY PHYSICAL CHARACTERISTICS, ADC, APDC,
OITR: AD GEO AND ADMINISTRATIVE DATA, APRONS, TWYS, OBST, MET INFO,
 RWY PHYSICAL CHARACTERISTICS, RADIO NAV AND LDG AIDS, 
 CHART RELATED TO AD, ADC, ALL SID, STAR AND IAC
OIYY: APRONS, TWYS, OBST, ADDN INFO, ALL IAC,
OIIO: HELIPORT GEO AND ADMINISTRATIVE DATA, APRONS, TWYS
 AND CHECK LOCATIONS/POSITIONS DATA, HELIPORT DATA,
 DECLARED DISTANCES, ADDN INFO.
